text.textblock: For the reasons set out in the preamble, 38 CFR part 4, subpart B, is amended as set forth below:
1. The authority citation for part 4 continues to read as follows:
2. Section 4.149 is added under the undesignated center heading `` Dental and Oral Conditions'' to read as follows:
Rating diseases of the teeth and gums.

Treatable carious teeth, replaceable missing teeth, dental or alveolar abscesses, periodontal disease (pyorrhea), and Vincent's stomatitis are not disabling conditions, and may be considered service-connected solely for the purpose of determining entitlement to dental examinations or outpatient dental treatment under the provisions of §§17.120 or 17.123 of this chapter.
